SC-S4.description: IQR monotonically increases as weight decreases

SC-1.description: Exists (weight, threshold) with realized WF exp > $1.50 and trade rate > 15%

SC-2.description: P(directional) IQR at best weight > 10pp (vs baseline 4pp)

outcome_description: REFUTED — class weighting doesn't spread the probability surface.
notes: Executed locally on Apple Silicon. Stage 2 trained ONCE per fold (weight=1.0). Stage 1 retrained per weight. Threshold sweep is post-hoc numpy on Stage 1 probabilities. Realized return PnL model identical to pnl-realized-return (PR #35). Only 19:7 geometry (10:5 excluded per spec).
